name: Life (Goth Jesus & Co.)
description:
Life is a short interactive experience about the your daily life after the recent loss of your best friend. 

-----

Made by Goth Jesus & Co., a group of Media Design School students as a proof of concept and compiling our personal experiences together. 

-----

  • Pedro Klein (@pedroklein)
  • Rasyiqah Takiyaudin (@xhikara)
